cloudy: A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition.
I love the cloudy days for they, too, contain beauty.
You can't make a cloudy day a sunny day, but can embrace it and decide it's going to be a good day after all.
A cloudy evening has the sun rays in them that shine through to make the earth glow.
There’s a bright spot in every dark cloud.
The sun always shines above the clouds.
She danced wild across the evening sky, dispersing clouds with the frill of her gown.
The air up there in the clouds is very pure and fine, bracing and delicious.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
Don't forget: Beautiful sunsets need cloudy skies.
sunny: Sunny days give us happiness; stormy days give us wisdom.
Staring up at the sky on a bright, sunny day makes me dream and gives me ideas.
Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face.
Laughter is a sunbeam of the soul.
A good laugh is sunshine in the house.
It is the artist’s business to create sunshine when the sun fails.
The sun does not shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world’s joy.
The sun is a daily reminder that we too can rise again from the darkness, that we too can shine our own light.
The sun will rise and set regardless. What we choose to do with the light while it’s here is up to us. Shine on!
The sun is new each day.
rainy: Let the rain kiss you. Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops. Let the rain sing you a lullaby.
Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life.
Don’t confuse your path with your destination. Just because it’s stormy now doesn’t mean that you aren’t headed for sunshine.
And when it rains on your parade, look up rather than down. Without the rain, there would be no rainbow.
The best thing one can do when it’s raining is to let it rain.
The person who dances with you in the rain will most likely walk with you in the storms.
Thy fate is the common fate of all; Into each life, some rain must fall.
There are many things I do for amusement, but for happiness, I like to gather up my memories and go for a walk in the rain.
Celebrate the rain; it only means that the sun shall shine bigger and brighter than ever.
If the rain spoils our picnic, but saves a farmer’s crop, who are we to say it shouldn’t rain?
snowy: The snow doesn't give a soft white damn whom it touches.
Snow provokes responses that reach right back to childhood.
In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
The snow is sparkling like a million little suns.
The first snow is like the first love, do you remember?
I love snow for the same reason I love Christmas: It brings people together while time stands still.
A snow day literally and figuratively falls from the sky, unbidden, and seems like a thing of wonder.
Snow falling soundlessly in the middle of the night will always fill my heart with sweet clarity.
The very fact of snow is such an amazement.
foggy: Fog is just clouds that have fallen to the ground.
Fog is like a mirror that reflects the beauty of everything.
Fog is a cloud that touches the earth.
The fog comes on little cat feet.
Fog is a beautiful thing when it doesn't hide the truth.
Fog is a cloud that's made contact with the ground.
Fog is a cloud that's fallen to the ground and doesn't want to get up.
Fog is not just mist, it's a feeling of being lost in time and space.
Fog is like a mystery waiting to be unraveled.
Fog is like a veil that covers the world.
